participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and creative, enjoys expressing herself through art and writing.
participant_1.background: I have brown curly hair. I'll graduate from high school in two years. I like riding horses. My bedroom is purple and lime green.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves singing and playing with friends.
participant_2.background: I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen. I play with my friends on the playground. I love to go to Disney World every year. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I am in the third grade.
